children.functionDescription: Do the logic for an entity implementing an AIType. Note that some entities, like the Player, do not implement and AIType.

actions.text: Do the logic for an entity implementing an AIType. Note that some entities, like the Player, do not implement and AIType.

children.functionDescription: Check the conditions to exectue the logic for an entity implementing either slot of ActiveAbility or PassiveAbility.

actions.text: Check if an entity with an AIType also implements an ActiveAbility or PassiveAbility and if so, trigger its ability update.

children.functionDescription: Executes the logic for an entity implementing either slot of ActiveAbility or PassiveAbility.

actions.text: Executes the logic for an entity implementing either slot of ActiveAbility or PassiveAbility.
